##Pages 
- [About YourBizFlow - Our Mission](/about): Discover the mission of YourBizFlow: simplify the management of 
- [AI Strategy Map - YourBizFlow](/aistrategymap): Generate strategic maps for your business with 
- [AI Writing Assistant - YourBizFlow](/aiwritingassistant): Generate professional content with 
- [Choose your subscription - YourBizFlow](/subscription): Discover the plans 
- [Login - YourBizFlow](/login): Log in to your YourBizFlow account to access your dashboard and manage your business. 
- [CRM - YourBizFlow](/crm): Manage all your customer and prospect relationships from a simple and powerful interface. Follow your contacts, segment your audience and never miss an opportunity again. 
- [Quotation - YourBizFlow](/quotes): Create and manage your quotes and commercial proposals. Easily convert your quotes into invoices and track their status. 
- [Budget Management - YourBizFlow](/budget): Create monthly budgets, track your expenses by category and keep control of your finances. 
- [Order Management - YourBizFlow](/ordermanagement): Manage the processing cycle of your customer orders, from preparation to delivery. 
- [Time Management - YourBizFlow](/timetracking): Track the time your employees spend on projects for accurate billing and better resource management. 
- [Task Manager - YourBizFlow](/taskmanager): Manage your missions, priorities and deadlines with the YourBizFlow task manager. 
- [Register - YourBizFlow](/signup): Create your YourBizFlow account and start managing your business more efficiently. Quick and easy registration. 
- [Trading Journal - YourBizFlow](/tradingjournal): Track and analyze your trading performance accurately. 
- [Integrated Mail - Coming Soon](/integratedmail): The integrated mail module is under development and will be available soon. 
- [Marketplace - YourBizFlow](/marketplace): Discover and activate modules to extend the functionality of your YourBizFlow platform.
